/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/hw.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/otb_window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o hw   -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/ysheng/Documents/CGT_620/build/graphics_lib graphics_lib/libgraphics_lib.so /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a /usr/lib/libboost_system.so.1.74.0 /usr/lib/libboost_filesystem.so.1.74.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lm -ldl -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
